Intervention: ● Randomized participants to receive bevacizumab and chemotherapy
● Randomized participants to receive chemotherapy alone
Eligibility: Invasive primary breast cancer is operational;
A definitive loco-regional surgery was performed;
A primary tumor centrally confirmed as triple negative.
Results: The IDFS was a composite criterion defined as the time of randomization up to the date of the first occurrence of one of the following events: recurrence of ipsilateral invasive breast cancer (same breast); recurrence of ipsilateral invasive breast cancer (same side of the body) in the local area (axilla, regional lymph nodes, chest wall and/or skin); remote recurrence (evidence of breast cancer at any anatomical site); death due to any cause; contralateral invasive breast cancer (opposite body) or second non-breast primary invasive cancer.
Duration: Conducted event (up to data threshold: 29 February 2012: up to 49 months)
Title of the arm/group: Bevacizumab and chemotherapy
Description of the arm/group: Randomized participants to receive bevacizumab and chemotherapy
Unit of measurement: Month NA [1] (NA to NA)
Description of the arm/group: Randomized participants to receive chemotherapy alone
Unit of measurement: Month NA [1] (NA to NA)
